MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL24 postcode area of Betws-Y-Coed, affecting properties in Penmachno and surrounding streets. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of repairs required to the network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.06AM on 25th October 2020.
